data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendonca, Maria Cleide de, Abrantes, Eduardo A., Neves, Ana Carolina R. (2012): New species of Isotomiella Bagnall, 1939 from Southeast of Brazil (Collembola, Isotomidae). ZooKeys 233: 21-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.233.3553, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.233.3553
